```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
library(drc)
library(lubridate)
```


```{r}
#gs4_auth(email = "maxwelco@gmail.com")
comp <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17E086oWhogy9mERBDz_586XWOmHtkW65yjDyZ7fo0M4/edit#gid=0")
```

```{r}
comp %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate_if(is_character, as_factor) %>% 
  mutate(tempo_data = lubridate::ymd(tempo_data)) -> comp1
```

```{r}
comp1 %>% 
  mutate(tempo_dias = yday(tempo_data) + 11)  %>% 
  mutate(tempo_dias = if_else(tempo_dias == 366, 0, tempo_dias)) -> comp2
```


```{r}
comp2 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = tempo, y = kg_ha, fill = herbicida)) +
  geom_boxplot(position = "dodge")
```


```{r}
comp2 %>% 
   ggplot(aes(x = tempo_dias, y = kg_ha, color = herbicida)) +
  geom_point()
```



```{r}
model <- drm(kg_ha ~ tempo_dias, herbicida, 
             fct = l3(fixed = c(NA, NA, NA)), data = comp2)
```

```{r}
plot(model, col = c(1,2), pch = 1,  log = "", type = "average", 
     xlim = c(0, 140), ylim = c(0, 4000))
```

```{r}
summary(model)
```
